profile.title: Profile
profile.aboutMe2: With my passion for acquiring new skills and continuously improving myself, I am an enthusiastic front-end developer with a growth mindset. After working as an Educational Technology specialist for six years, I successfully completed an intensive Workintech front-end development program to advance myself in the software development field. Alongside my strong communication and problem-solving skills, I am ready to progress towards becoming a proficient professional in software development, emphasizing my dedication to teamwork.

0.title: Technological Foods
